item.description:
Biotech Tuesday
When: Tuesday, January 18th, 7:00 p.m. - 10:00 p.m.
Where: Hard Rock Cafe - Boston
22-24 Clinton Street
Boston, MA 02109

Website and Register: http://www.biotechtue... or $20 at the door

Biotech Tuesday is Boston's premier biotech networking group which has been around since 2001. It currently caters to over 4,000 people involved with the biotech field by hosting monthly events with an average turnout of 150-200 people. For more information, please check out the website. Also in order to be on the list for the event, you MUST register through the website. Otherwise, there is a $20 charge at the door to attend. For more details, check out www.biotechtuesday.com.
item.name: Biotech Tuesday
